scripts.predev: bash -lc 'pids=$(lsof -ti :3000 || true); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill $pids || true; sleep 1; pids2=$(lsof -ti :3000 || true); if [ -n "$pids2" ]; then kill -9 $pids2 || true; fi; fi'
scripts.dev: pnpm clean && tsgo --project tsconfig.json --outDir ./dist --noEmit false && concurrently --kill-others --names "TSGO,API" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "tsgo --project tsconfig.json --watch --outDir ./dist --noEmit false" "bash -lc 'source \"$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh\" && nvm exec 22 node --watch ./dist/server.js'"
scripts.__comment_test__: The main test script below uses concurrently to run the mock provider, server and the test runner
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others --success first --names "MOCK,API,TEST" -c "bgYellow.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "pnpm:test:mock" "pnpm:test:dev" "wait-on tcp:localhost:3101 tcp:localhost:3100 && pnpm test:run"
scripts.test:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DATA_SOURCE_PREFERENCE=filesystem PORT=3100 CLUSTER_WORKERS=0 PORT_RETRY_COUNT=0 bash -c './node_modules/.bin/tsx ./dev/testSetupCli.ts setup && ./node_modules/.bin/tsx server.ts'
